thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Canary Wharf - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice location and practical
thread.title_full: Nice location and practical - Review of Point A Hotel, London Canary Wharf, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Bulent K
title: Nice location and practical
text:
If you are visiting Canary Wharf area for business, this hotel offers the most of your expectancy. The staff is also so sympathetic and helpful. I would like to thank Canan and Jana personally for their help during my stay. You can control the color of the light in your room as well.
Room Tip: Practical and accessible See more room tips
